Class FinalBoss.FortifyHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.ai.FinalBoss.FortifyHandler
  • Enclosing class:
    FinalBoss

    private static class FinalBoss.FortifyHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This handles all the fortify operations for the FinalBoss.
    Since:
    2018-02-27
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getFortify

        public FinalBoss.Entry getFortify(AIController api)
        Receives the best possible FinalBoss.Entry fortify for FinalBoss to perform.
        Parameters:
        api - The AIController that this FinalBoss will use to query the state of the game.
        Returns:
        The best possible FinalBoss.Entry fortify.

      • getFortifies

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,FinalBoss.Entry> getFortifies(AIController api,
                                                                      java.util.Set<Country> internal,
                                                                      java.util.Map<Country,java.lang.Integer> frontline)
        Retrieves all the possible fortifications based on the current state of the game.
        Parameters:
        api - The AIController that this FinalBoss will use to query the state of the game.
        internal - The Countrys that border NO enemy Countrys
        frontline - The Countrys that border enemy Countrys
        Returns:
        All the possible fortifications based on the current state of the game.

      • defineFrontline

        private void defineFrontline(AIController api,
                             java.util.Set<Country> internal,
                             java.util.Map<Country,java.lang.Integer> frontline)
        Iterates through each Country on the Board and adds the Countrys that border enemy Countrys to 'front line' and Countrys that border NO enemy Countrys to 'internal'.
        Parameters:
        api - AIController
        internal - The Countrys that have no enemy Countrys neighbouring them.
        frontline - The Countrys that have enemy Countrys neighbouring them. The value is the number of enemies the Country has.
